data.title: Baptist Foundation of New England — Baptist Churches of New England
data.meta_description: The Baptist Foundation of New England supports long-term ministry through the Baptist Convention of New England. Donors can make a long-term spiritual impact by investing their financial resources through giving pathways that support effective ministries with the potential for multiplication in Bost
data.text:
Why New England?

New England has the unique distinction of being both the least-reached region in the United States and one of the fastest-growing areas for new churches and baptisms. God is truly working here in a unique way.

When you give to one of the Baptist Foundation of New England ministry funds, you don’t have to wonder if your donation is making a difference. Give now and have the joy of knowing your gift will have a lasting impact for God’s Kingdom that will continue to affect generations to come!

Why the BFNE?

Deciding how to invest your financial resources for long-term spiritual impact can be challenging. The Baptist Foundation of New England can help.

The BFNE can guide you as you join in the exciting things God is doing in New England. We provide pathways that support effective ministries with the potential for multiplication. Based on the passions God has put on your heart, we can suggest opportunities that will increase momentum in an area where God is already working.
